name: MoodGenie
0:
”Alexa, tell Mood Genie I'm happy”
”My words are Mood Genie is great!”
”What was my mood yesterday”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mood genie
des:
In our busy and fast-paced lives, we often forget to prioritize good self-care habits. Mood Genie helps you to get in touch with your mental health. You can save your moods at any time, and Mood Genie will remember it for you. You can also ask Mood Genie how you felt at any time, and Mood Genie will share it with you anytime you wish to know.

Mood Genie can recognize hundreds of different emotions, such as happy, sad, angry, fear, surprised, and many more.

To get started, say "open Mood Genie".

Here are some things you can try with Mood Genie:

To share your mood with Mood Genie, say: "I am feeling happy!"

To share some details about your mood, say: "My words are Mood Genie is great!"

To find out how you felt in the past, say: "What was my mood three days ago?" or "What was my mood on March 17th 2020?"

To setup a daily reminder, say: "Remind me at 5pm"

PREMIUM MEMBER FEATURES
+ You can save your mood every hour, instead of just once a day!
+ You can give as many details about your mood, instead of just five words!
+ You can use a wider variety of moods, instead of just the core five moods!

PARKTECH COMPANY
ParkTech provides high quality solutions to improve your life. 

YOUR REVIEW/FEEDBACK
We'd love your feedback and would appreciate if you leave a review. If you have questions or need support, please contact: parktechcs@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
